title: Smart storage is turned off, device acting as if it's still on
content:
The smart storage option on my device is turned off. Yet my photos on my device are still being removed and transfered to the cloud. Because of this I cannot view my photos without an internet connection.

I have tried reinstalling the photos app, turning back up off, and downloading my photos again, but they are still removed after a couple weeks.

I'm sick and tired of this. I just want my photos on my device.
